author: mbluj
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds VVLoose working points (WPs) of two species of the MVA2017v2 TauID which were forgotten in #26541. 

Supposed to be backported to 10_6_X for UL.

#### PR validation:

PR tested successfully with a "Tau re-reco + MiniAOD" workflow on top of AOD input file. 

The PR causes that the MiniAOD sequence run on old RECO/AOD samples, i.e. with old tau collections w/o the two new WPs, fails. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

N/A
title: Followup of switch to TauId MVA2017v2
